document.full_text: veterinarians examined a rare giant turtle considered sacred by many vietnamese at a makeshift hospital in hanoi on monday to check mysterious lesions afflicting one of the last four known members of its species.
document.title: asia: vietnam: rare giant turtle gets rare check-up
lines_and_colors: veterinarians examined a rare giant turtle considered sacred by many vietnamese at a makeshift hospital in hanoi on monday to check mysterious lesions afflicting one of the last four known members of its species.
